mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MTM WHERE MEMBER_NO = ${memberNo}

SELECT MTM_NO ,MTM_TITLE ,MEMBER_NICKNAME , CASE WHEN SYSDATE - MTM_DATE < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - MTM_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - MTM_DATE < 1 / 24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - MTM_DATE) * 24 * 60 ) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - MTM_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - MTM_DATE) * 24 ) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR( MTM_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) END MTM_DATE
,DECODE(MTM_ANSWER, NULL, '답변예정', '답변완료') MTM_ANSWER FROM MTM JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ${memberNo} ORDER BY MTM_NO DESC
SELECT BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_CONTENT FROM BOARD WHERE CODE_NO = 'QNA' AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT MTM_TITLE , CASE WHEN SYSDATE - MTM_DATE < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - MTM_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - MTM_DATE < 1 / 24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - MTM_DATE) * 24 * 60 ) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - MTM_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - MTM_DATE) * 24 ) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR( MTM_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) END MTM_DATE
,MTM_CONTENT ,MTM_ANSWER ,MTM_NO ,MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM MTM JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MTM_NO = ${mtmNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVE WHERE MEMBER_NO = ${memberNo}

SELECT RESERVE_NO ,ROOM_ID ,ROOM_NAME ,TO_CHAR( RESERVE_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) RESERVE_START ,TO_CHAR( RESERVE_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) RESERVE_END ,RESERVE_PRICE , (CASE WHEN RESERVE_DEL_FL = 'Y' THEN '취소' WHEN SYSDATE < RESERVE_END AND RESERVE_PAYMENT = 'Y' THEN '결제완료' WHEN SYSDATE >= RESERVE_END AND RESERVE_PAYMENT = 'N' THEN '취소(미결제)' WHEN RESERVE_PAYMENT = 'N' THEN '미결제' WHEN SYSDATE >= RESERVE_END THEN '이용완료' END ) STATUS ,DECODE( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SERVICE_RESERVE SR WHERE SR.RESERVE_NO = R.RESERVE_NO), 0, '미신청', (SELECT SUBSTR ( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT(COL, ',', SERVICE_NAME) ORDER BY SERVICE_NO).EXTRACT('//text()' ).GETSTRINGVAL() , 2) AS SERVICE_NAME FROM SERVICE_RESERVE SR JOIN SERVICE USING(SERVICE_NO) WHERE SR.RESERVE_NO = R.RESERVE_NO) ) SERVICE_NAME_LIST
,MEMBER_NO FROM RESERVE R JOIN ROOM USING(ROOM_ID) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ${memberNo} ORDER BY RESERVE_NO DESC
